Class EasyContentHandler

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler
public class EasyContentHandler
extends ContentHandlerWrapper

Adds some convenient methods to a content handler.

Method Detail

startElement

public void startElement(String tag,
                         Map<String,String> attributes)
                  throws SAXException
Starts an element. No automatic namespace processing.

Parameters:
tag - The tag name as it will appear in the XML, whether it's qualified or not.
attributes - The attributes as Map from key to value. The keys of the map are the keys of the attributes, whether they are qualified or not.
Throws:
SAXException
